resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105121</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105121</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101425</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">NASA: STS-118 Launch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die NASA: Produkteinführung STS-118</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LA NASA : Lancement STS-118</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">NASA: Lançamento STS-118</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">NASA: Lancio STS-118</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">NASA: Στς- 118 έναρξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">NASA: Lanzamiento STS-118</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Endeavor heads toward the International Space Station with teacher-turned-astronaut Barbara Morgan aboard. For larger resolution and downloads see: http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bemühung geht in Richtung zur internationalen 
Raumstation mit Lehrer-drehen-Astronauten Barbara Morgan an Bord 
voran. Für größere Zerlegung und Downloads sehen Sie: 
http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effort se dirige vers la station spatiale 
internationale avec le professeur-tourner-astronaute Barbara Morgan à
bord. Pour une plus grands résolution et téléchargements 
voyez : http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O esforço dirige para a estação de espaço 
internacional com professor-gir-astronauta Barbara Morgan a bordo. 
Para a definição e downloads maiores veja: 
http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'attività dirige verso la stazione di spazio 
internazionale con l'insegnante-gir-atronauta Barbara Morgan a bordo. 
Per più grandi risoluzione e trasferimenti dal sistema centrale
verso i satelliti veda: 
http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλια προσπάθειας προς το διεθνή διαστημικό σταθμό 
με τον δάσκαλος-γυρίζω-αστροναύτη Barbara Morgan στο 
κατάστρωμα. Για το μεγαλύτερο ψήφισμα και μεταφορτώνει 
βλέπει: http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El esfuerzo dirigió hacia la estación espacial 
internacional con el profesor-dar vuelta-astronauta Barbara Morgan a 
bordo. Para una resolución y transferencias directas más 
grandes vea: http://www.nasa.gov/multimedias/videogallery/</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:NASA
FN:NASA
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101425</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105121</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/nasa-sts-118-launch</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
